title: Add Scripter component with AI chat interface

requirements.text: Create a new Scripter component that provides a chat interface where users can describe the scripts they want the AI to generate for them

quotes: make another box that says scripter and when you click it the chat box and tell the ai what you want him to script for you

acceptanceCriteria: A new Scripter component exists with a chat-style interface similar to TranslatorChat and ArtCanvas
The component includes a text input area where users can describe what script they want
The component displays a conversation history of user requests and AI-generated script responses
The chat interface follows the existing dark theme design patterns used in other components

requirements.text: Add the Scripter component as a new tab in the main application interface alongside the existing tabs (Chat, Math Solver, Media Gallery, Translator, Music Generator, Art)

quotes: make another box that says scripter

acceptanceCriteria: A new 'Scripter' tab appears in the tab navigation in App.tsx
Clicking the Scripter tab displays the Scripter component
The tab ordering and styling is consistent with existing tabs

requirements.text: Implement AI script generation functionality in the Scripter component that processes user script requests and generates code or script output based on the description

quotes: tell the ai what you want him to script for you

acceptanceCriteria: When a user submits a script request, the component generates a simulated code/script response
The generated script is displayed in the chat history with appropriate formatting (code blocks, syntax highlighting if possible)
The script generation process shows a loading state while processing

constraints: Follow the existing component architecture patterns used in TranslatorChat, ArtCanvas, and MusicGenerator
Maintain consistency with the dark theme established throughout the application
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Actual code execution or compilation of generated scripts
Integration with external AI APIs for real script generation
Syntax validation or linting of generated code
